com.mongodb
Class MongoCredentialsStore

java.lang.Object
  com.mongodb.MongoCredentialsStore

@ThreadSafe
 class MongoCredentialsStore
extends java.lang.Object

An effectively immutable store of credentials to mongo servers. It enforces the invariant that there can be at most one credentials for each database. It allows at most one credentials with a null database. There is still a package-protected method to add a new credentials to the store, but it's only there to support DB.authenticate, which allows you to add new credentials at any point during the life of a MongoClient.

Since:
2.11.0
